title: A Time for Georgia

description: Describes the pathology of a four-year-old autistic child. Characteristic behaviour of this syndrome is clearly presented, as well as the gains such a child can make in a therapeutic nursery. Filmed at a community-based, therapeutic nursery-kindergarten.
